alerts.failedShipmentsPartiallyPlacedBody: To buy these, please add them into your bag and place the order for them again. You've not been charged for them.

habitatArgosCommunicationTitle: Look out for details from Argos

habitatArgosCommunicationMessage.COLLECTION: Argos will email and text your collection details.
